```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
```

## Mean arrival and dep delay

```{r}
flights %>%
  summarize(mean(..., na.rm = ...))
```


```{r}
flights %>%
  group_by(...) %>% 
  summarize(mean(..., na.rm = ...)) %>% 
  ungroup
```

# Air time by carrier

```{r}
flights %>% 
  group_by(...) %>% 
  summarize(acc_air_time = ...(air_time, ...)) %>% 
  ungroup
```
